name: Swab the Deck!
description:
Swab the Deck! is a pirate-themed roguelike deckbuilder with realtime combat.
Fight ships by playing cards while sailing into deeper and deeper waters.

Currently includes 20 cards, 5 enemy types, 4 random events, and a boss fight.
Follow us if you would like to play an expanded version of this game in the future!

Instructions:
Click and drag cards up to play them
Scroll up or down to reveal the map
Click an icon on the map to travel there
You can manage your deck by clicking Show Deck in the bottom left
Press ESC to exit windows build

Made with Unity and Gaia 2
Art created in Blender and Aseprite
Music recorded in Studio One 5
Sounds used: 
https://soundbible.com/909-Cannon.html
https://soundbible.com/1936-Crisp-Ocean-Waves.html

                 Created By:

Daniel Sousa | Sam Westerlund | Andrew Potach
